comment: Example daily metrics written by MonitorHandler
description: This file is written to s3://fraud-detection-metrics-{BUCKET_SUFFIX}/metrics/{batchDate}.json by MonitorHandler for historical tracking

notes.batchDate: Date of the transaction batch (YYYY-MM-DD format)
notes.avgFraudScore: Average fraud score across all transactions in the batch (0.0 to 1.0)
notes.highRiskPct: Percentage of transactions with fraud score >= 0.8
notes.mediumRiskPct: Percentage of transactions with fraud score >= 0.5 and < 0.8
notes.lowRiskPct: Percentage of transactions with fraud score < 0.5
notes.avgScoreDrift: Absolute difference between current avgFraudScore and 30-day baseline
notes.highRiskDrift: Absolute difference between current highRiskPct and 30-day baseline
notes.driftDetected: true if avgScoreDrift > 0.1 OR highRiskDrift > 0.05, indicating model drift
notes.usage: MonitorHandler loads the last 30 days of these files to calculate baseline metrics
notes.alerting: If driftDetected is true, an SNS alert is sent to the monitoring topic
